page.title: 15A BIRSTALL PET SHOP
page.content: Birstall pet shop is in Libra Parade, opposite a line of shops which are converted houses. One was the village poor house. The shop sells guinea-pigs, rabbits, budgerigars, hamsters, finches and gerbils. A lot of the animals are reared by local people. The shop also sells tablets, medicine, cages, food and most other things your pet could need. You can also buy books about looking after pets and animals. It is open nearly all week but it is closed on Wednesday afternoon and all day Sunday. The best selling bird is the budgie and the best selling animals are gerbils and hamsters. The shop will not sell a pet to a child unless they are certain that they have the permission of their parents.
